channel.title: Webcam?
channel.description: hey i have ubuntu 9.10. ive got it in about two months now and i need some help with the webcamera on aMSN when i try to use it i see i picture of me but its not moving and the other one just sees white. can somone help me get my webcam work? like we both see a moving picture of me :) ???

item.title: Webcam?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

or skype, msn is not very good with video

Read full topic

item.title: Webcam?
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

a bit unrelated to the msn question specifically, but if you want to try the app cheese, it might work with your webcam better. you could tell your msn contact to talk to you through there? just an fyi, though, i do not use webcams so i have no idea if it will or not. i only know of it because i removed it when i installed fc12

Read full topic
